name: CHANNEL SWITCHER CTRL/CMD+K: Exclude private channels the user isn't in, and channels outside the team
objective: Private channels I don't belong to and channels outside the team are not reflected in the search

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:

Private channel I do belong to appears
